bug.author: johann-petrak
bug.summary: doc_classification_cola example uses wrong method for inference
bug.description: In line 107 of doc_classification_cola.py the method run_inference for Inferencer is used but this should really be inference_from_dicts This is present in master as of commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/FARM/commit/41644de7a0b8331b6d1ba1aeca9c77431509b4dc>41644de</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Great! Thanks for reporting and fixing <denchmark-link:https://github.com/johann-petrak>@johann-petrak</denchmark-link> !
